column17:
Paris Hilton Can Can Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2250

Flirtatious and mysterious this luxury scent is inspired from the extravagant and larger than life spirit of Moulin Rouge. Embodying the spirit of the wild and spirited dance Paris Hilton Can Can sets your senses on fire. Created by Jean-Claude Delville this animated Eau de Parfum is made for the popular brand of Paris Hilton.

A citrusy infusion of succulent clementine tart notes of blackcurrant and apricot-peachy scent of nectarine make up an explosive top note. It is followed by a stunning and upbeat heart note that is composed of powdery-floral hints of wild orchid along with sweet and refreshing notes of orange blossom. This inviting fragrance ends with a warming base note that exudes smoky hints of amber along with the distinctly heavy yet soothing scent of musk. The sprightly mix of natural extracts create a floral fruity oriental fragrance that wraps you in an electrifying garb any time you choose to wear it. This tantalising perfume comes encased in a playful bottle with a slender neck that flows into a curvaceous base. It flaunts a striking colour scheme of fuchsia and ivory white along with a chic asymmetrical stopper radiating a pink hue. It is delicately decorated with a detailed sketch of a single feather in fuschia against the white surface. A single whiff of Can Can and slip into your dancing shoes for a wild night on the town.

Paris Hilton Heiress Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1980

Heiress from the fashion house of Paris Hilton infuses myriad hues of fruity and floral essences into an accord that is emblematic of poised sensuality and glamour. Inspired by Paris Hilton herself - heiress to the Hilton fortune this exotic Eau de Perfume is a charmingly flirtatious embodiment of cool youthful energy. Refreshing and exciting at the same time Heiress is opulent luxury encased in a bottle with an invigorating aroma that seduces you with its mysterious magnetism.

The exhilarating top note opens with accords of passion fruit succulent orange peach granite and delicious champagne mimosa. The sparkling heart note of tiare lily star jasmine sweet honeysuckle grenadine and the pleasing aroma of candied ylang-ylang is perfectly complimented by a sheer floral base note of violet leaf vetiver Tahiti tonka and blonde woods. Adroitly blended and artistically bottled by Henry de Monclin this sparkling and bright fragrance is an essential expression of feminine chic unquestionably meant for the heiress in you.

Paris Hilton Just Me Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1835

Young sensual and entrancingly feminine the charm of Just Me lies in its heady fruity-floral cocktail essence. But the delightful Just Me by Paris Hilton is not just a sculpted vial of youthful exuberance. The enlivening aroma of this fragrance is the reflection of a self-assured woman in her prime who exudes confidence and embraces life with energy and passion.

Created by acclaimed perfumer Steve Demercado the luxurious aroma of Just Me enthralls your senses with sparkling top notes of luscious raspberry fresh and juicy bergamot the dust of violet and pink pepper. The bewitching heart note of iris lily of the valley freesia creamy white rose and honeyed ylang-ylang gently mingles with the soft note of Tahitian vanilla Egyptian sandalwood velvety musk and a hint of woody accords of the warm base note. Flirty and fun Just Me adds a vibrant zest to your aura be it during a sultry summer evening or the cosy romantic winter date. This certainly is a fragrance that is forever just you.

Paris Hilton EDP - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2150

Extravagant and bewitching popular artist Paris Hilton presents the woman of today with the essence of her charm captured in the a luxury fragrance. The Eau de Parfum is for the woman who is effervescent and cheery. Paris Hilton EDP is her constant companion through tears and smiles and all the trials that life takes her through. She is a woman who is embraces her femininity and is not afraid of reaching out for what she wants.

Created by perfumers James Krivda and Steve Demercado Paris Hilton EDP has juicy top notes with accords of luscious peach and red apple. The heart note trails into the combined assault of mimosa freesia and jasmine petals. The dry down leaves behind a sultry freshness that comes with sandalwood oakmoss and vibrant ylang ylang. The organic yet soothing range of ingredients is perfect for any time of the day and carries you through your week in a cloud of euphoria. The seductive fragrance is encaptured in a cylindrical flacon that radiates a pretty pink aura decorated with black vertical waves. Slather yourself in the trendy and upbeat quality of Paris Hilton EDP that appeals to the modern and fun-loving woman.

Paris Hilton Fairy Dust Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3389

An enchanting and radiant aroma makes this luxury scent stand apart in a class of its own. A fragrant concoction of natural extracts gives Paris Hilton Fairy Dust a sensuous aura perfect for a magical woman. Mane USA is credited with the creation of this delectable Eau de Parfum for the upscale brand of Paris Hilton.

This lovely fragrance starts off with a beautiful top note comprised of fragrant pink peony extracts and zesty notes of orange blossom. Trailing into the heart note that combines the fruity essence of peach with the silky aroma of gardenia and refreshing water lily. Finishing off this delightful fragrance is a lovely and deep scented base note that marries earthy patchouli soothing notes of musk and creamy vanilla. The fresh oriental woody fragrance is perfect for a special evening out. A light green tinted fragrance glimmers through the crystal clear vial decorated with the silhouette of a fairy in the center. With a metallic neck and a stopper shaped like a jewel emitting a blue tint this vial represents the epitome of femininity. A whiff of this entrancing perfume converts any woman into a celestial nymph.

column17:
Paris Hilton Tease Eau de Parfum - 50 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3204

An ode to the glamorous Hollywood diva Marilyn Monroe Tease is an inspired creation from Paris Hilton and pays tribute to the beauty and seductive charm of the classic sensation and her Hollywood connection in retrospect. Created by perfumer Steve De Mercado this mesmerizing fragrance was launched in 2010 and designed specifically for the quintessentially feminine seductress who inspires sighs with a flick of her locks or a quiver on her lips. Filled with passionate sensuality and an intense invigorating appeal the Paris Hilton Tease Luxury Eau de Parfum is a warm and exotic Chypre-floral-oriental scent that appears in an elegantly designed vial with a purple tinge. While the expository notes indulge you in the fruity richness of Bergamot Peach and Red Apple the heart of the perfume leads you to a sweet floral treat with Frangipani Jasmine and Tuberose. The final lingering dry-down brings forth the aromas of Sand and Amber. With an enigma surrounding the vintage charm of this Women’s Eau de Parfum the Paris Hilton Tease flatters and flirts with the senses to make its way straight to the hearts of your admirers.
